title: Correction to: Dietary tryptophan affects group behavior in a social bird
content: This is a correction to: Beatriz C Saldanha, Patrícia Beltrão, Ana Cristina R Gomes, Marta C Soares, Gonçalo C Cardoso, Sandra Trigo, Dietary tryptophan affects group behavior in a social bird, Behavioral Ecology, Volume 35, Issue 3, May/June 2024, arae018, https://doi.org/10.1093/beheco/arae018
